title: Elbow Chair - Real Leather Cushion - Square Black/Solid American Ashwood
body: Danish Designer, Hans J Wegner created the Elbow In 1956, a clean simple stackable chair, he created two prototypes this being the first, the 2nd being the rounded cushion option which Mobelaris also offer. An uncomplicated design that gives excellent comfort, with Italian leather linear cushion adding extra comfort. The chair is widely used for dining, cafe's, and high-end restaurants.
